nodes.text: According to Gungan religion, Kobble was the god of feasts and good food. Along with and the trickster god Nododo and the god of games Wamka Pol, Kobble was one of the less serious Gungan deities.

This deity only appeared in the French edition of the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds, in the database entry pertaining to the Gungan society. This detail was absent from the English version of the entry. Several other deities such as Dobbis, Balam or Nododo, are also exclusive to the French version of the database. Though most of these names were not used in any other source, Nododo was set to appear in The Essential Guide to Episode I before it was cancelled.
